title: Virtual humans help aspiring doctors learn empathy

title_detail.value: Virtual humans help aspiring doctors learn empathy

summary: Delivering bad news in a caring way -- and coping with a patient's reaction -- is a key skill for doctors. Intuitive technology is helping medical students learn the best approaches.

summary_detail.value: Delivering bad news in a caring way -- and coping with a patient's reaction -- is a key skill for doctors. Intuitive technology is helping medical students learn the best approaches.
